Teaching

  • Exercise sessions in Linear algebra

    Sessions has started the 22 February 2016. Sessions usually take place on Mondays at 09h45 and are taught in French.

    You will be assigned weekly homeworks that you hand me the following week at the beginning of the course. I will then give an extended correction. After the session, I will post the correction on moodle. At the end of the semester, based on you work, you will be awarded a bonus (from 0 to 2) to your score at the exam.

    Link to the moodle page of the course.
